activity.title: Quiz with HTML
activity.content:
{"id":958,"title":{"en":"Quiz with HTML"},"description":{"en":"

Examples of different features and activities


"},"props":{"courseversion":"20220203084840","showfeedback":2,"passthreshold":0,"maxattempts":"unlimited","maxscore":5,"digest":"4ce5dae70fd8e3e2ad8150dc4c663aac"},"questions":[{"order":1,"id":977,"question":{"id":597,"type":"multichoice","title":{"en":"

This question has some basic HTML in it.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit,

  • sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt
  • ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
  • Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris

P and Text alignment?

This is a blockquote.
Table title
a1 bbb
a2 ccc
a3 ddd

"},"props":{"maxscore":1,"shuffleanswers":"1"},"responses":[{"order":1,"id":250,"props":{"id":747,"feedback":{"en":"

Feedback in plain text

"}},"title":{"en":"

Choice in plain text

"},"score":"0.0000"},{"order":2,"id":171,"props":{"id":283,"feedback":{"en":"

Feedback with HTML!

  • hfgd hgfhkdjgfnhgkfdjh
  • fdghkjfnghk jdfhgfhgdhdgf 

"}},"title":{"en":"

Choice with HTML!´

  • And a list
  • of unordered items

"},"score":"1.0000"}]}},{"order":2,"id":641,"question":{"id":499,"type":"multiselect","title":{"en":"

Testing partially correct answers

"},"props":{"maxscore":1,"shuffleanswers":"1"},"responses":[{"order":1,"id":23,"props":{"id":881,"feedback":{"en":"

Here we have a feedback with HTML. A list for example:

  • one
  • two
  • threee items!

"}},"title":{"en":"

This one is correct

"},"score":"0.5000"},{"order":2,"id":335,"props":{"id":189,"feedback":{"en":"

Yes, this is correct!

"}},"title":{"en":"

This is correct as well! 

And has some HTML into it
"},"score":"0.5000"},{"order":3,"id":184,"props":{"id":848,"feedback":{"en":"

That's wrong.... please go back and review the course

"}},"title":{"en":"

This not.

"},"score":"0.0000"}]}},{"order":3,"id":379,"question":{"id":18,"type":"shortanswer","title":{"en":"

This short answer

has some HTML layout into it,

like line breaks and... color!

"},"props":{"maxscore":1},"responses":[{"order":1,"id":586,"props":{"id":684},"title":{"en":"yes"},"score":"1.0000"}]}},{"order":4,"id":879,"question":{"id":107,"type":"multiselect","title":{"en":"

Strange characters selection

"},"props":{"maxscore":1,"shuffleanswers":"1"},"responses":[{"order":1,"id":437,"props":{"id":259},"title":{"en":"Always store the vaccine vials in vaccine carriers at +2°C to +8°C during vaccination"},"score":"0.3333"},{"order":2,"id":97,"props":{"id":282},"title":{"en":"

Option 2

"},"score":"0.0000"},{"order":3,"id":288,"props":{"id":156},"title":{"en":"

Option 3

"},"score":"0.3333"},{"order":4,"id":860,"props":{"id":226},"title":{"en":"

Option 4

"},"score":"0.3333"}]}},{"order":5,"id":618,"question":{"id":615,"type":"multichoice","title":{"en":"

Question with lists as responses

"},"props":{"maxscore":1,"shuffleanswers":"1"},"responses":[{"order":1,"id":902,"props":{"id":815,"feedback":{"en":"

Correct!

  1. Step A
  2. Step B
  3. Step C
  4. Step D

"}},"title":{"en":"

  1. Step A
  2. Step B
  3. Step C
  4. Step D

"},"score":"1.0000"},{"order":2,"id":155,"props":{"id":588,"feedback":{"en":"

Incorrect, the right response is 

  1. Step A
  2. Step B
  3. Step C
  4. Step D

"}},"title":{"en":"

  1. Step B
  2. Step C
  3. Step A
  4. Step D

"},"score":"0.0000"},{"order":3,"id":809,"props":{"id":228,"feedback":{"en":"

Incorrect, the right response is 

  1. Step A
  2. Step B
  3. Step C
  4. Step D

  1. Step D
  2. Step C
  3. Step B
  4. Step A

"},"score":"0.0000"}]}}]}
